Description: Clay tablet; fragment; Sumerian literary; mentions Abi-eshuh; Old Babylonian; numerous loose pieces broken from main fragment including three large ones.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.219)
Condition: Incomplete; numerous loose pieces broken from main fragment including three large ones.
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
